attributes.action: Follow the Australian Premiere's example and ban the British Cricket team from visiting Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the last occasion there was a tour to Zimbabwe our Prime minister left the decision to go to the conscious of the individual players. Yet the rules of the ICC mean that unless they are banned by their Government from going they play or become disqualified.

Michael Howard's Government in Australia thinks leaving it to the players  is unfair and has banned Australian players from visiting Zimbabwe. He has appealed to to other Governments to follow suit. I agree.

rejection.details: You may wish to change the wording to 'John Howard'.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
